start.text: A wolf is on the prowl! You are one of the three little pigs. Choose your starting action:

straw_house_branch.text: You've chosen to build a straw house. What do you do?

options.text: Invite a friend (the duck) for help.

stick_house_branch.text: You've chosen to build a stick house. What do you do?

options.text: Reinforce the frame with extra sticks.

brick_house_branch.text: You've chosen to build a brick house. What do you do?

options.text: Finish quickly, no time for extras!
Fortify the door with a steel lock and hire a boar as a guard.

ending_1.text: The wolf huffs and puffs and blows your house down! You're captured!

ending_2.text: The wolf still blows the house down, but you and the duck escape through the chimney!

ending_3.text: The wolf huffs and puffs and *mostly* blows your house down. You narrowly escape, but your friend, the rabbit, gets caught!

ending_4.text: The wolf huffs and puffs, but the house holds! He tries to climb the roof, but you've prepared a trapdoor and he falls into a boiling pot of soup! You have wolf stew for dinner.

ending_5.text: The wolf can't blow down the house. He tries the chimney, but you've blocked it! He gives up and goes hungry.

ending_6.text: The wolf tries everything, but the house is impenetrable. The boar chases him away. You live happily ever after, with excellent security.
